name: DJ Fever
description:
Get your fingers ready for the ultimate music game! DJ Fever is an easy to learn, hard to master music game where you tap to the beat of the song.

When you enter DJ Fever, you enter another world where you can:
• Challenge yourself with multiple difficulties from Easy to Extreme
• Collect Music on your way to domination

--------- How to play ----------
• Really simple, but not easy at all: Tap the circle as it reaches scoring areas. You score by getting as much combo as possible with Perfect tap accuracy.

Enjoy the game!
